QuestionTxt: Thinking again about the 2010 health care law...to the best of your knowledge, would you say the health care law does or does not...allow undocumented immigrants to receive financial help from the government to buy health insurance?
StudyNote: 602 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 607 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 321 who had no landline telephone.

RespTxt: No, law does not do this
